org.apache.catalina
Interface ContainerListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
FastEngineMapper, NamingContextListener, ServerLifecycleListener
public interface ContainerListener

Interface defining a listener for significant Container generated events. Note that "container start" and "container stop" events are normally LifecycleEvents, not ContainerEvents.

Version:
$Revision: 466595 $ $Date: 2006-10-21 18:24:41 -0400 (Sat, 21 Oct 2006) $
Author:
Craig R. McClanahan

Method Summary
 void containerEvent(ContainerEvent event)
          Acknowledge the occurrence of the specified event.
 

Method Detail

containerEvent

public void containerEvent(ContainerEvent event)
Acknowledge the occurrence of the specified event.

Parameters:
event - ContainerEvent that has occurred
